btrplace.solver.choco.constraint.mttr

Class OnStableNodeFirst

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.constraint.mttr.OnStableNodeFirst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, solver.search.strategy.selectors.VariableSelector<solver.variables.IntVar>

    public class OnStableNodeFirst
extends Object
implements solver.search.strategy.selectors.VariableSelector<solver.variables.IntVar>
    A heuristic that first focus on scheduling the VMs on nodes that are the source of actions liberating resources.

    For performance reason, the VM placement is put into a cache that must be invalidated each time the placement is modified

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void invalidPlacement()
